alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 3:50AM CDT until May 19 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cowley County in south central Kansas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 350 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Geuda Springs to 5 miles east of Chilocco to Kaw Lake, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Burden, Dexter, Geuda Springs, Cambridge, Maple City and Strother Field Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
